name: Chubriks
description:
Beta Test! The game about funny entity names 'Chubriks'. They are hate plants. In this game you need kill 27 boss plants.

Game is on hold

-MOVE-

A,D - Left,Right

Space - Jump

RMB - Attack

LMB - Use poiton

--How to update?--

-press download now

-download

-start

-choose right version

 

Try not die and have fun!
